    • escapeOr

      public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component escapeOr(String message, Function<String,net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> ifNotEscaped)
      Returns an escaped message if it starts with '\'
      Parameters:
      message -
      ifNotEscaped - Method to run on input if string is not escaped
      Returns:
      Plain text component if not escaped, otherwise a component generated by ifNotEscaped function
